name.value: v2 Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme

description.value: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0356 ( Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme)

valueString.value: Note that the escape sequences used in this mode do not use the ASCII "esc" character, as defined in ISO 2022-1994. They are "HL7 escape sequences" as first defined in HL7 2.3, sec. 2.9.2. (Also, note that sections 2.8.28.6.1and 2.9.2 in HL7 2.3 correspon

display.value: The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".

value.value: De modus om te wisselen van tekenset gedefinieerd in HL7 2.5, sectie 2.A.46, "XPN - uitgebreide persoonsnaam".

display.value: This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.

value.value: Dit is de standaardwaarde, om aan te geven dat er geen wisselingen van tekenset voorkomen in dit bericht.

valueString.value: This standard specifies an escape sequence from basic one byte character set to specified other character set, and vice versa. The escape sequence explicitly specifies what alternate character set to be evoked. Note that in this mode, the actual ASCII esc

display.value: This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .

value.value: Deze standaard heet "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique".
